successes.title: Space Monkey: Taking the cloud out of the datacenter
successes.description: More space, less moolah. Complete Cloud storage subscription service in one little device -- Space Monkey.

Pledges.description: It might seem like a small donation, but not to us. We'll show our thanks by personally thanking you via Facebook, Twitter or email.  You will also be included in product updates and future product decisions we make through surveys and other means. Thank you for your support.

Exclusive Space Monkey tshirt: When history has been written and we've changed how the world stores data forever you can say to your kids, "I helped make that happen and I've got the tshirt to prove it."
Early-bird special. 1 Terabyte of Space Monkey storage for 12 months (device included in your subscription).

The AFTER Early Bird Special: For those of you who missed out but are still pledging on the first day we want to reward you (if you already pledged higher feel free to change your pledge) Thank you for your support.
1Terabyte of Space Monkey service for 12 months (device included in your subscription).
1Terabyte of Space Monkey service for 12 months (device included in your subscription).
Tshirt + 1Terabyte of Space Monkey service for 12 months (device included in your subscription).
You spoke. We answered. Get the exclusive Kickstarter tshirt and the product.
2 Terabytes of Space Monkey service for 12 months (device included in your subscription).
2-years of 1TB service. That's 3+ months of free service for buying an extra year upfront. It's like summer vacation from elementary school: no homework all summer long!
Purchase the Space Monkey device +3years of the subscription (for yours to keep). Comes in matte black or white.
